events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund based on references to wanting money back due to product fit issues.
This case has been assigned to Support Agent Maria Gonzalez to handle the refund request for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I’m here to help with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or if it’s still in original condition?
My order number is 8745623. The jacket is brand new, tags still attached, and it has not been worn outside.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately. You will receive an email with return shipping instructions shortly.
Great, thank you for the quick response! I appreciate the clear instructions and prompt assistance.
The refund request has been successfully processed on our side. Please follow the steps in the email to complete the return shipment.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the return shipping label and that everything is on track for your refund.
The case has been closed following confirmation of the refund being credited to your account. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
